XII.i.1.C.1.d
.
Information Required to Process an In-Service Death Claim
Processing of a claim for Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) may begin based on receipt of the following documents:
DD Form 1300
, or
Interim
DD Form 1300
, and
VA Form 21P-534a, Application for Dependency and Indemnity Compensation by a Surviving Spouse or Child—In-Service Death Only
.
Notes
:
Signed or unsigned copies of the
DD Form 1300
may be accepted electronically from a service department.
Initiate development for
DD Form 1300
or interim
DD Form 1300
if not received with the
VA Form 21P-534a
.
References
:  For information on
the jurisdiction of in-service death claims, see
M21-1, Part II, Subpart ii, 3.1.b
, and
in-service death claim labels for EP 130 and EP 140, see
M21-4, Appendix C
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section C - In-Service Death and Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) Claims
